Avatar

Avatar are created with two states, with and without a picture.

File to include

@include "components/avatars";

Without picture

<div class="avatar avatar-empty avatar-80"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-empty avatar-72"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-empty avatar-64"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-empty avatar-56"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-empty avatar-48"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-empty avatar-40"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-empty avatar-32"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-empty avatar-24"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-empty avatar-16"></div>

With picture

<div class="avatar avatar-80" style="background: url(/assets/images/pic-avatar.jpg)"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-72" style="background: url(/assets/images/pic-avatar.jpg)"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-64" style="background: url(/assets/images/pic-avatar.jpg)"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-56" style="background: url(/assets/images/pic-avatar.jpg)"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-48" style="background: url(/assets/images/pic-avatar.jpg)"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-40" style="background: url(/assets/images/pic-avatar.jpg)"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-32" style="background: url(/assets/images/pic-avatar.jpg)"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-24" style="background: url(/assets/images/pic-avatar.jpg)"></div>
<div class="avatar avatar-16" style="background: url(/assets/images/pic-avatar.jpg)"></div>
